1.0.0.description: A PostCSS plugin to add color functions that reference hues and shades of your color palette.

scripts.test: NODE_PATH=./test:./src:$NODE_PATH mocha test/ --recursive --compilers js:babel-core/register --reporter spec --require babel-polyfill
scripts.test:cover: NODE_PATH=./test:./src:$NODE_PATH babel-node $(npm bin)/isparta cover --reporter text --reporter html $(npm bin)/_mocha test/ -- --recursive --reporter spec
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.build: npm run clean && babel src --out-dir lib
scripts.preversion: npm run clean && npm run check
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm run clean
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
